record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in adjournment under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 10:52 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, January 18, 2007, at 9 a.m.
